newsitem.title: ISRAEL: PLO officials say Hebron deal not likely soon.
newsitem.headline: PLO officials say Hebron deal not likely soon.

text.p: Palestinian officials said on Friday an agreement with Israel on the handover of Hebron to Palestinian control was not likely soon.

"Most of the essential points we have not resolved," a senior Palestinian official, who did not want to be identified, told Reuters. When asked if an agreement on Hebron was far off, the official responded: "Yes."
